MPC

Class StmtCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • MPC.ASTNode
      • MPC.Stmt
        • MPC.StmtCase

  • public class StmtCase
extends Stmt
    Representation of a CASE statement. The case statement consists of an ordinal expression (the case index) and a list of statements, each being prefixed by one or more constants of the type of the case index. It specifies that the one statement be executed that is prefixed by the value of the case index; it is an error if no constant denoting that value prefixes any statement. Each value must be specified by at most one case constant. Example: 
        case Operator of
      Plus:   W := X+Y;
      Minus:  W := X-Y;
      Times:  W := X*Y
    end
    Version:
    1.0
